aboutPartOne: Thullo is web application for managing teams workflow. It is developed in scope of programming challenge which is provided by <tag>{{link}}</tag> resource. It is inspired by original Trello team management web application.
aboutPartThree: Check original <tag>{{link}}</tag> web application as well.
thulloTitleText: Thullo helps teams move work forward.
thulloDescriptionText: Collaborate, manage projects, and reach new productivity peaks. From high rises to the home office, the way your team works is unique—accomplish it all with Thullo.
errorGeneric: Something went wrong. Please, try again.
errorGenericClickToReload: Something went wrong. Please, click here to reload data.
errorGenericDescription: Please, try again or refresh page.
errorThatNeverHappens: Application execution error appeared. This should never happens.
errorPasswordDontMatch: Passwords that you have entered don't match. Please, check your passwords and try again.
errorInvalidPassword: You have entered invalid password. Please, check your password and try again.
errorCantRefreshToken: Error appeared during refreshing access token. Please, try again.
errorDontHaveProjectsTitle: You don't have any active projects.
errorDontHaveProjectsDescription: Please, press 'Add' button to add new project or request to join for existent.
